presentationTable.name: Facts - Job Requisition
presentationTable.description: A folder containing measures related to job requisition. Various phases and states related metrics,  job requisition aging, and job opening counts

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions in Draft Phase (Period End)
presentationColumns.description: Number of distinct active job requisitions in draft phase at the end of the given time period
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Job Requisitions in Draft Phase (Period End)

localization.localizationKey: Job Requisitions in Draft Phase (Period End)

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions in Approval Phase (Period End)
presentationColumns.description: Number of distinct active job requisitions that are  in approval phase at the end of the given time period
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Job Requisitions in Approval Phase (Period End)

localization.localizationKey: Job Requisitions in Approval Phase (Period End)

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions in Formatting Phase (Period End)
presentationColumns.description: Number of distinct active job requisitions that are  in job formatting phase at the end of the given time period
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Job Requisitions in Formatting Phase (Period End)

localization.localizationKey: Job Requisitions in Formatting Phase (Period End)

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions in Posting Phase (Period End)
presentationColumns.description: Number of distinct active job requisitions that are  in posting phase at the end of the given time period
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Job Requisitions in Posting Phase (Period End)

localization.localizationKey: Job Requisitions in Posting Phase (Period End)

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions in Open Phase (Period End)
presentationColumns.description: Number of distinct active job requisitions in open phase at the end of the given time period
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Job Requisitions in Open Phase (Period End)

localization.localizationKey: Job Requisitions in Open Phase (Period End)

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions Not in Open Phase (Period End)
presentationColumns.description: Number of distinct active job requisitions that are not in open phase at the end of the given time period

localization.localizationKey: Job Requisitions Not in Open Phase (Period End)

presentationColumns.name: Total Openings
presentationColumns.description: The number of total openings specified for a job requisition

presentationColumns.name: Total Job Requisitions
presentationColumns.description: Total Number of Requisitions in all phases and states except Canceled, Deleted, Filled state.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Total Job Requisitions

presentationColumns.name: Recruiter Count
presentationColumns.description: Distinct Count of Workers identified as recruiters.

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions in Open Phase (Period Begin)
presentationColumns.description: Number of distinct active job requisitions in open phase at the beginning of the given time period
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Job Requisitions in Open Phase (Period Begin)

localization.localizationKey: Job Requisitions in Open Phase (Period Begin)

presentationColumns.name: Vacancy Fill Rate
presentationColumns.description: The percentage of open requisitions that have been filled in a time period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Vacancy Fill Rate

presentationColumns.name: Job Requisitions by Recruiter
presentationColumns.description: Average number of job requisitions by recruiters
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Snapshot.Job Requisitions by Recruiter

presentationColumns.name: Percentage of Job Requisitions Not Open
presentationColumns.description: Percentage of job requisitions created but not yet open.
